DOC.brief_title: Incidence Cancer Women Increased Genetic Risk Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine prospective incidence ovarian cancer , fallopian tube cancer , breast cancer , primary peritoneal cancer , cancer among woman increase risk ovarian cancer , special emphasis woman know breast cancer susceptibility gene ( BRCA ) 1/2 mutation carrier . II . To develop precise point estimate cancer rate among woman undergone risk-reducing salpingo-oophorectomy woman elect screen . III . To compare cancer rate two group woman . IV . To good characterize similarity differences cancer risk BRCA mutation-positive family BRCA mutation-negative/family history-positive family . V. To develop preliminary estimate overall cancer-specific mortality , stratify mutation status ( BRCA1-positive , BRCA2-positive , BRCA1/2-negative ) . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients complete Health Update Questionnaire annually 5 year . The questionnaire focus specifically cancer risk , incidence , mortality . Patients also receive ongoing communication ( e.g. , periodic newsletter , copy study-related publication , etc . ) keep inform regard study-related research result , new research finding , new research opportunity patient may eligible , evolve clinical recommendation regard hereditary breast/ovarian cancer .
DOC.criteria: Enrolled GOG0199 Completed original 5year followup period OR offstudy due pregnancy development new cancer Completed OffStudy form ( Form Q00199 submit via SEDES ) No patient offstudy end initial 5year followup period ( find ineligible consent withdrawal )
